text: Pedro Agramunt Font de Mora (12 September 1951 â€“ 25 November 2024) was a Spanish politician. Agramunt was born in Valencia, Spain. He was a member of the Senate of Spain from 2008 until his death. He was a member of the Spanish Congress of Deputies from 1989 to 1991. He was a member of the People's Party. He was also a Chairman of the European People's Party from 2016 until his death. Agramunt died on 25 November 2024 in Valencia at the age of 73.Fallece el exsenador y expresidente del PP valenciano Pedro Agramunt ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2024 deaths Category:European Union politicians Category:Spanish politicians
title: Pedro Agramunt
